name: Record-Journal-ThingstoDoCalendarBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Get today's local event listings in Central Connecticut from the Record-Journal.

This flash briefing will update you with the most relevant events in the area happening each day. The Record-Journal partners with CitySpark to provide the most complete collection of local events anywhere, allowing you to find out about everything happening in your town or neighborhood.

Find more event details, create an account, or submit an event at http://www.myrecordjournal.com/things-to-do/
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
